::Killfest/Greven/EndBringer/FZ/Firearm/Kluster::

Killfest smashes his fist into Vehement's missile as it approaches, 
feeling his armor being charred but not really caring. The armor 
could take alot more than just that.

His shoulder missile launcher fires two energy seeking missiles at 
Vehement, his EMP rifle firing three shots.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven took all three blasts, nearly falling backwards but regaining 
his balance. He sets one of his missile launchers to seeking, firing 
two normal missiles from one gun and two energy seeking missiles from 
the other, all at Sun Crusher.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer lands on the ground, the missiles flying over his head. He 
growls, two missile launchers flipping out of his shoulders and 
aiming at Reflector. They both fire two missiles, the missiles 
locking onto Reflector's propulsion system and flying toward it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm's jetpack takes him out of the way of Menasor's attack, the 
Maximal looking down at the stump of his leg and evaluating the 
mechfluid loss.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FZ smiles, looking behind him. Unicron seemed to be distracted by 
other bots. He spins around, firing two of his missiles (the energy-
draining ones) at Unicron.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster gets up, coughing again. The stinkin' ash wasn't good for his 
lungs. He aims his missile launcher, firing two missiles at Menasor's 
head, the only object he could easily see through the still-thich ash 
around the area where the shuttle had hit.







--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Icedemon, you posted that your shot exploded and formed a bubble 
around me, 
> that is moding.  You had Rattrap fire two shots, and then 25 rapid 
shots.  
> That is a total of 27 shots, two shots over the limit)
> 
> Unicron/Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Shockwave/Demon Wulf/Dark 
Claw/Flesh
> Ripper/Streetwise/Groove:
> 
> 
> 
> Unicron saw a bolt coming, and fired off two optic blasts before it 
was 
> several feet away from Angel Prime.  Flying up quickly, he avoided 
most of 
> the shots fired on him but two plasma charges hit him square in the 
chest 
> knocking him back a foot in mid air, the robot only laughing.
> 
> He fired off five rapid optic blasts at Rattrap and raised both 
arms, 
> launching an energy-signature seeking missile at Starwind from one, 
and a 
> missile of the same type at Angel Prime.
> 
> ---
> 
> Vehement dodged the EMP blasts and a missile, the other exploding 
against his 
> chest armor but not piercing it.  He sighed as his chest singed 
painfully, 
> raising an arm and launching an energy-signature seeking missile at 
Killfest, 
> followed by a single optic blast.
> 
> ---
> 
> Sun Crusher gained altitude rapidly, escaping two missiles, the ion 
disks, 
> and the fireballs, two optic blasts intercepting one missile, the 
other 
> knocking Sun Crusher backwards in the air a few feet.  He raised a 
wrist, the 
> cannon attached to it firin three fusion blasts at Greven.
> 
> ---
> 
> Reflector watched Endbringer land and jump into the air in 
Reflector's 
> direction, but didn't even get close since Reflector was around a 
hundred 
> feet up.  
> 
> "These heathens grow dumber by the day." he laughed, raising a 
wrist and 
> firing down two missiles at the Predacon scum.
> 
> ---
> 
> Demon Wulf almost fell because of Streetwise's precise shots, but 
he growled 
> and fired off three optic blasts at the Maximal's sternum.
> 
> ---
> 
> Flesh Ripper felt the blasts strike and laughed at Groove, forming 
an orb of 
> energy in his left palm with the equal power of a grenade and 
throwing it at 
> him.
> 
> ---
> 
> Dark Claw felt a fireball strike him, but in his heavily armored 
mode it 
> didn't do any harsh damage.  He launched four missiles off at the 
CF.
> 
> ---
> 
> Streetwise yelled out, the grenade-like orb sending him flying back 
in the 
> air and crashing to his back, a small hole in his cheset armor.  He 
coughed 
> up some mech-fluid and began gathering strength to get up, until 
the rapid 
> blasts from Shockwave pierced into his already wounded chest.  
Getting up 
> wasn't on his mind for now.
> 
> ---
> 
> The force of the optic blasts twirled Groove, who let out a sigh of 
anger and 
> ducked down, firing of two photon blasts at Demon Wulf's right knee 
joint, 
> and three optic blasts up at Shockwave.
> 
> ---
> 
> Shockwave rolled in the air, avoiding the laser blasts, and 
launched two 
> missiles down at the Cybertronian Fire, soon followed by twenty-
five rapid 
> laser blasts.
